scenes.prompt: On a black background, a Mexican beach scene. Sand stretches across the bottom of the frame. Three palm trees stand on the left side. Ocean water visible on the right. A sun is positioned in the upper right corner. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a large aged parchment scroll unfurled horizontally across the center of the frame. The number '1519' is written in bold old-fashioned serif lettering, centered on the scroll. The scroll edges are slightly curled and weathered. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, five wooden sailing ships with tall masts arranged in a row along a shoreline, each engulfed in flames. Thick smoke rises from each ship toward the top of the frame. The ships sit in shallow water with sand visible at the bottom edge. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Cortés's men are watching their only way home turn into smoke.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, five conquistador soldiers in the foreground, arranged in a row facing away from the viewer toward the right side of the frame. Each soldier wears a morion helmet (tall with curved brim), metal chest armor, and holds a sword at their side. Their heads are tilted upward, watching. In the background on the right, silhouettes of burning wooden ships with flames and smoke rising. Simple cartoon style with clean lines, consistent soldier design across all five figures.

On a black background, the text 'WHY?' in large bold sans-serif letters centered in the frame. The question mark is extra large, taking up half the height of the frame. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Because Cortés understood something about the human brain.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, Hernán Cortés on the left side of the frame, wearing a morion helmet with plume, full beard, metal armor with shoulder plates and arm guards, right hand tapping his temple with index finger, confident knowing smirk on his face. On the right side, a cartoon brain with small stick arms and stick legs, two wide dot eyes and an open surprised mouth on the frontal lobe, floating with both arms raised in shock. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: When retreat is an option, your brain will negotiate.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a cartoon brain with small stick arms and stick legs, two narrowed scheming dot eyes and a sly grin on the frontal lobe, seated at a rectangular negotiation table in the center of the frame. Papers and documents are spread on the table. Behind the brain in the upper right corner, a glowing 'EXIT' door with light emanating from around its frame. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a cartoon brain with small stick arms and stick legs, two pleading dot eyes and a negotiating expression on the frontal lobe, centered in the frame. Both hands raised with fingers counting off demands. Two speech bubbles extend from the brain: one in the upper left reading 'Just 5 more minutes', one in the upper right reading 'One more episode'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a cartoon brain with small stick arms and stick legs, two sneaky dot eyes and a mischievous grin on the frontal lobe, standing beside a metal filing cabinet on the right side of the frame. The brain's right arm reaches into an open drawer, pulling out papers. Papers scattered on the floor around the brain are labeled 'TOO TIRED', 'NOT READY', and 'TOMORROW'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, an oval speech bubble centered in the frame containing the text 'Maybe tomorrow...' in italicized text. The bubble has a faded, weak outline. Small ellipsis dots trail off at the end. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, an oval speech bubble centered in the frame containing the text 'Just this once...' in italicized text. The bubble has a faded, weak outline. Small ellipsis dots trail off at the end. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, an oval speech bubble centered in the frame containing the text 'I'll do it twice next week...' in italicized text. The bubble has a faded, weak outline. Small ellipsis dots trail off at the end. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a standing cartoon person centered in the frame, head nodding with a resigned knowing expression, eyes half-closed in acknowledgment. Right hand pointing at their own chest with index finger. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Your brain does this every day.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a cartoon brain with small stick arms and stick legs, two scheming dot eyes and a sly grin on the frontal lobe, centered in the frame. Surrounding the brain in a circle, seven small calendar day icons labeled 'MON', 'TUE', 'WED', 'THU', 'FRI', 'SAT', 'SUN', arranged like a clock face. Small arrows connect each day to the brain at center. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: But when retreat isn't an option?
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a rectangular door centered in the frame with the word 'EXIT' on a sign above it. Three heavy chains stretch horizontally across the door. A large padlock hangs at the center where the chains meet. The door is completely blocked and impassable. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a cartoon brain with small stick arms and stick legs, two focused determined dot eyes and a straight closed mouth on the frontal lobe, centered in the frame with arms crossed over chest. In the lower left corner, a negotiation table tilted at angle, half off-frame with motion lines trailing behind it. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: No Plan B means Plan A actually works.

The poster is crumbling and breaking apart, eight pieces fragmenting and floating away toward the edges of the frame. Three jagged cracks run through the poster. The letters at the edges are fading. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a blueprint drawing centered in the frame showing precise geometric lines, measurement arrows, and technical notations. The word 'DESIGN' appears in bold engineering-style stencil font at the bottom center with a soft glow. A compass icon in the lower left corner and a ruler icon in the lower right corner. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: The behavioral scientists have a name for this.

Right arm extended with index finger pointing to a chalkboard on the left side of the frame. The chalkboard shows a blank label placeholder. The scientist has an explaining expression with mouth slightly open. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

Small chalk dust particles float near the bottom of the board. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Fancy words for a simple idea: create constraints that corner you into growth.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a standing cartoon person in the lower right corner of the frame, body positioned in a corner formed by two walls. The left wall is labeled 'CONSTRAINT', the back wall is also labeled 'CONSTRAINT'. The person looks upward with a determined expression. A large upward arrow extends from above the person toward the top of the frame, labeled 'GROWTH'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Here are four forcing functions you can set for yourself.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, four outlined rectangular boxes arranged in a horizontal row across the center of the frame, evenly spaced. Each box has a number inside: '1', '2', '3', '4' from left to right in bold text. A cartoon hand with index finger extended points at the boxes from the lower left corner. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a standing cartoon person on the left side of the frame, standing behind a podium with a megaphone held to their mouth, speaking outward. On the right side, a crowd of five simplified listener figures arranged in a semi-circle, all facing the speaker. The number '1' in large text floats in the upper right corner. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Tell people what you're going to do.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a standing cartoon person on the left side of the frame, mouth open speaking, gesturing with both hands. On the right side, three listener figures stand in a row facing the speaker, attentive expressions. Two speech bubbles extend from the speaker containing 'I WILL...' and 'MY GOAL IS...'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a standing cartoon person centered in the frame, hands cupped around mouth in a shouting gesture, mouth wide open. Curved sound wave lines radiate outward from the person in all directions—up, down, left, and right—spreading to the edges of the frame. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Social pressure is one of the oldest motivators on Earth.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a simple outlined globe centered in the frame showing continental outlines. Surrounding the globe in a circle, eight cartoon eyes with eyebrows, evenly spaced, all looking inward toward the globe. Small arrows point from each eye toward the globe, indicating inward pressure. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.prompt: On a black background, a leather wallet on the left side of the frame with dollar bills inside. An arrow extends from the wallet pointing right toward a cartoon brain with small stick arms and stick legs, two attentive dot eyes and a focused expression on the frontal lobe, on the right side. Determined fierce expressions with furrowed brows and gritted teeth on all faces. Three motion lines trail behind each soldier. Simple cartoon style with clean lines, consistent soldier design across all five figures.

In the background on the right, three burning wooden ship silhouettes with flames and smoke rising upward toward the top of the frame. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
